title: How good is Realme X smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will not tell you about phones specifications because that you will get on internet easily.I can say that real me is almost complete in every aspects,Take anything Display (amold**), processor, battery (**20 watt fast charger it fully charged your device almost 80 minutes) . Only the coans are not having notification lite if you like it Very much and also why they give hybrid sim slot unlike real me 3 pro in which it is given. I am using real me 3 pro and trust me real me phones are great. Hope you will like it

Realme X is a device with pretty ample specs at the price point in which it is released. It comes with pop-up selfie camera and in-screen fingerprint scanner with is something different at this price. Support of Snapdragon 710 chipset is same which was provides in Realme 3. It also comes with 3765 mAh battery with fast VOOC charge 3.0 For full details and Overview of Realme X you can visit here : Realme X - Overview Thanks:)
